example.name: passive
example.text: The personal antics of agency Director Amadou-Mahtar M'Bow [*ICH*-5] drew much attention , such as when several of his top aides were uncovered [*-2] as KGB plants and ejected [*-2] from France [*T*-1] and when a mysterious office fire was set [*-12] just before Congress sent accountants [0] [*T*-4] to trace U.S. funds [*T*-3] .
